trans-unit.source: Provides a specialized <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"></xref> that is optimized for loading images using [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 提供专用<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"></xref>经过了优化，用于加载映像使用[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: BitmapImage primarily exists to support [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] syntax and introduces additional properties for bitmap loading that are not defined by <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource>.
trans-unit.target: BitmapImage 主要存在是为了支持[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]语法和位图加载，未定义的<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource>引入附加属性

trans-unit.source: BitmapImage implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize> interface to optimize initialization on multiple properties.
trans-unit.target: BitmapImage 实现<xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize>接口来优化多个属性上的初始化。</xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize>

trans-unit.source: Property changes can only occur during object initialization.
trans-unit.target: 属性更改才会在对象初始化过程。

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.BeginInit%2A> to signal that initialization has begun and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.EndInit%2A> to signal that initialization has completed.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.BeginInit%2A>发出信号初始化已开始和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.EndInit%2A>以指示已完成初始化。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.EndInit%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.BeginInit%2A>

trans-unit.source: After initialization, property changes are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 初始化后，将忽略属性更改。

trans-unit.source: BitmapImage objects created using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.%23ctor%2A> constructor are automatically initialized and property changes are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 使用创建的 BitmapImage 对象<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.%23ctor%2A>构造函数将自动初始化和属性更改将被忽略。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage> implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize> interface to optimize initialization on multiple properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage>实现<xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize>接口来优化多个属性上的初始化。</xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize></xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage>

trans-unit.source: To initialize a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage> created using this constructor, you must perform property initialization between <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.BeginInit%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.EndInit%2A> calls.
trans-unit.target: 若要初始化<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage>使用此构造函数创建的你必须执行之间的属性初始化<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.BeginInit%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.EndInit%2A>调用。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.EndInit%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.BeginInit%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage"></xref> class with an image whose source is a <xref:System.Uri>, and is cached according to the provided <xref href="System.Net.Cache.RequestCachePolicy"></xref>.

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage>使用此构造函数创建的对象将自动初始化。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage>

trans-unit.source: After initialization, property changes are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 初始化后，将忽略属性更改。

trans-unit.source: BitmapImage is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: BitmapImage 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。

trans-unit.source: Set the CacheOption to <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption?displayProperty=fullName> if you wish to close a stream used to create the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage>.
trans-unit.target: 设置为<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption?displayProperty=fullName>你想要关闭流用于创建<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption?displayProperty=fullName> CacheOption

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption> cache option retains access to the stream until the image is needed, and cleanup is handled by the garbage collector.
trans-unit.target: 默认值<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption>缓存选项保留对流的访问权限，直至需要图像，并且由垃圾回收器处理清理。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the height, in pixels, that the image is decoded to.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置高度，以像素为单位，图像解码为。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.DecodePixelWidth%2A> is also set, the aspect ratio of the bitmap is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.DecodePixelWidth%2A>也是设置时，忽略位图纵横比。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.DecodePixelWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.DecodePixelWidth%2A> is not set, the aspect ratio remains the same.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.DecodePixelWidth%2A>未设置，纵横比保持不变。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.DecodePixelWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_jpeg](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-jpeg-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_png](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-png-md.md)] codecs natively decode the image to the specified size; other codecs decode the image at its original size and scale the image to the desired size.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_jpeg](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-jpeg-md.md)]和[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_png](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-png-md.md)]编解码器本机将图像解码为指定的大小; 其他编解码器在其原始大小将图像解码和缩放为所需大小的图像。

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage"></xref>是下载内容; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支持。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage"></xref> does not support the Metadata property and will throw a <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage"></xref>不支持的元数据属性，将引发一种<xref:System.NotSupportedException>。</xref:System.NotSupportedException>

trans-unit.source: Not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支持。

trans-unit.source: An attempt to read the Metadata occurs.
trans-unit.target: 尝试读取元数据时发生。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the angle that this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage"></xref> is rotated to.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的角度这<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage"></xref>向旋转。

trans-unit.source: Rotation is performed after scaling.
trans-unit.target: 缩放后执行旋转。

trans-unit.source: This means that an image that has a Rotation of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation>, a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.DecodePixelWidth%2A> of 10, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.DecodePixelHeight%2A> of 5 will result in an image that has a width of 5 and a height of 10.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着，映像具有的旋转<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation>、<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.DecodePixelWidth%2A>为 10，和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.DecodePixelHeight%2A>的 5 将导致映像具有 5 宽度和高度为 10。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.DecodePixelHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.DecodePixelWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation>

trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |

trans-unit.target: 适用于旋转<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage"> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the stream source of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置流的源<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: If StreamSource and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.UriSource%2A> are both set, the StreamSource value is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果 StreamSource 和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.UriSource%2A>都设置，将忽略值 StreamSource。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.UriSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.CacheOption%2A> property to <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption?displayProperty=fullName> if you wish to close the stream after the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage> is created.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.CacheOption%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption?displayProperty=fullName>如果你想要关闭后的流<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage>创建。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.CacheOption%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption> cache option retains access to the stream until the bitmap is needed, and cleanup is handled by the garbage collector.
trans-unit.target: 默认值<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption>缓存选项保留对流的访问权限，直至需要位图，并且由垃圾回收器处理清理。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption>

trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，表示来自 HTTP 的源的图像的缓存策略。

trans-unit.source: UriCachePolicy is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: UriCachePolicy 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。
